main_definition: A long seat designed for multiple people, usually found outdoors in parks or along streets, and can also refer to a period of not playing a sport due to injury.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Furniture consisting of a flat horizontal surface supported by legs
meanings_and_examples.example: The wooden bench in the park was worn out from years of use.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A place where people sit or rest, typically provided for public convenience
meanings_and_examples.example: We sat on the stone bench while waiting for our friends to arrive.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The time period during which an athlete does not participate in a sport due to injury
meanings_and_examples.example: After his knee surgery, he spent several months on the bench before returning to play soccer.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A measure of performance often used in sports and competitions, indicating how many games or matches an athlete has missed due to injury
meanings_and_examples.example: His bench time this season was one game less than last year's total.
